tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I Met Dr Idris
For my Hairfall n dandruff things,he explained me very well and he understood my concern related to my problem, he is very soft spoken and very good understanding doctor,he has very good n clean clinic and the ambience of the clinic is vibing really good 😊
The medication also is available in their clinic
He has many other cosmetics services too
Must try. I made good choice choosing Clinique Internationale Located in Jayanagar 5th block opposite to Sri Raghaswamay Mutt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,

review: I can easily recommend this doctor for any dental related issues. IMO he is one of the top dental surgeons in Bangalore. We are saying this because we have visited 3 top dentists before consulting Dr. Idris. He explained the possible complications with wisdom tooth surgery. He was very honest with the recommendations he made. We decided to go with doctor and he handled my wife's wisdom tooth surgery like a charm. No nerve damage or infections. She was able eat normally after 2 days.The prices are very reasonable compared to other clinics. We would definitely visit him again 😊
reply_text: Thank you Harish for your feedback
